headline: Low Cost With a High-End Vibe
abstract: There’s a boom in low cost skin-care products with a luxury vibe. Here, a look at some of the best of the new class.
lead_paragraph: Remember the heyday of high-end miracle moisturizers? Creams could promise beautiful skin via proprietary elixirs and secret blends. For a long time, luxury skin care put a big price tag on mystery — ingredients that spurred hope and wonder in a pretty jar.
